text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/XhspoyTG79

On Thurs 18 March, 6,303 new cases and 95 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK.

25,735,472 people have received the 1st dose of a #vaccine, and 1,879,054 have received a 2nd dose. https://t.co/BvF9dz4tpN
